name: EffectiveSoft
description:
EffectiveSoft is an international software development company with more than 20 years of professional experience. The key competence in recent years has been dedicated to fintech and a healthcare.
The company is headquartered in San Diego, CA, and offers both local and offshore presence with a team up to 250 people. Over the years, EffectiveSoft has successfully implemented 1500 projects for a number of industries and business sectors over the globe.
